default.name: Undeclared
default.hint: You may pick an option other than Field Commission at any point in your Pathfinder Career. By default with no selection, you gain Pathfinder Lore and a leveled Healing Potion.

spells.name: School of Spells
spells.hint: Followers of the School of Spells pursue magic as much as any fame or material reward, and are provided a selection of magic scrolls with each mission.

scrolls.name: School of Scrolls
scrolls.hint: The School of Scrolls values knowledge above all else, before each mission the School provides its adherants a selection of magical and mundane consumables.

swords.name: School of Swords
swords.hint: The School of Swords works to ensure a strong martial protection for the Society's scholarly pursuits, its members prepare from a selection of consumables which counter and defend against special threats.

generalist.name: Generalist
generalist.hint: Well-rounded in their preparations, Generalists have access to more potent healing potions than specialists in addition to a wide variety of alchemical goods.

fieldcomission.name: Field Comission
fieldcomission.hint: Only selectable at character creation, a Field Comission eschews the per-mission consumables in exchange for three days of additional downtime.
